title: Can I answer questions about interest for higher marks or is this sinful? üßêüìù
transcript: Ahmed from Bangladesh sham Sheik I'm an economics student student and I usually have to answer questions in support of things that are not in Sharia such as taxation interest so sometimes I get the choice to answer questions in support of things that are not in Shar or answer questions that do not support this so if I choose to answer questions that support the things that are not in Sharia because I can answer them better and get better marks am I sinful since I have a choice not to answer no problem inshallah in that
